messages.content: ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool is a simple 3D model processing tool within ComfyUI, offering features such as model optimization, UV unwrapping, and custom node functionality.
ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool provides functions for array operation, mesh data retrieval and manipulation, camera pose conversion, UV unwrapping, automatic normal calculation, ply file handling, and more.
Please explain the basic functions of ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool.
The basic functions of ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool include array sequence, data conversion, OBJ import, PLY import, direct preview window, and save functionality.
What are the features available in ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool for model optimization?
Model optimization features in ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool include remove debris, reduce faces by percentage (vertices), cut subdivision, turbine smoothing, convert to quads, and other optimizations.
What are the available model editing functions in ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool?

Model editing functions in ComchyUI-3D-MeshTool include UV decomposition (xatlas), automatic vertex normals, support for the UV channel of obj, group support for ply, UV remap, restore normalized vertices to their original state, high-poly to low-poly texture/bump baking, AO baking, ply segmentation, and more.
How does ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool handle loading and saving of ply files?
ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool can load a PLY file using the Ply_load function and save a PLY file using the Ply_save function.
What are the data types included in ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool's array operations?
ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool's array operations include operations on numbers, boolean values, strings, vectors, matrices, and other data types.
